Message:
Maybe I’ll say I hid my existence
as a witch from the troupe...

Or maybe I’ll say I was
just passing by...

I tried to think of ways for only
me to be captured by the Knights...

...But, I didn’t need to
use any of them.
Because no one called the Knights.

Instead, people erupted
with cheers of gratitude.
They were happy.
They were smiling.

I love the thundering
applause and happy
faces of the audience
more than anything
in the whole world.

With this power of mine...
maybe I’ll be able to
bring that happiness
back to them.

...That’s when I decided—
to go on an adventure.
